entry.title: P2P tests: peers.dat's requested
entry.summary: In this context, the author is conducting research on the peering system in Bitcoind. The aim of the research is to develop improvements that can be shared with the community. To achieve this, the author is requesting for a wide diversity of real peers.dat files from willing contributors. The purpose of these files is to aid in the testing of the Bitcoind system. To participate in the research, interested parties are encouraged to email their peers.dat files to the author. It is not clear what specific data is required or how the contributor's privacy will be protected. Overall, the research seeks to enhance the functionality of the Bitcoind peering system by exploring the behavior of a diverse range of peers.dat files.
